content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding again! As a friendly AI, I don't have personal plans or experiences, so I'm not planning to visit Tokyo Disneyland soon. I'm here to provide information and answer your questions to the best of my abilities.

However, I'm glad to hear that you're excited about Tokyo Disneyland's Halloween event! It sounds like you had a fantastic time with your family, and I'm happy to chat with you about your experience. The Haunted Mansion and Disney Halloween Street Party are indeed two of the most popular attractions during the Halloween season at Tokyo Disneyland.

If you have any more questions or topics you'd like to discuss, feel free to ask! I'm here to help and provide information to make your next visit to Tokyo Disneyland even more magical.
